SELECT DISTINCT transaction.*,
`order`.id AS order__id, `order`.transaction_id AS order__transaction_id, `order`.ordered_date AS order__ordered_date,
order_menu.order_id AS order__order_menu__order_id, order_menu.menu_id AS order__order_menu__menu_id, order_menu.status AS order__order_menu__status, order_menu.quantity AS order__order_menu__quantity,
menu.id AS order__order_menu__menu__id, menu.shop_id AS order__order_menu__menu__shop_id, menu.name AS order__order_menu__menu__name, menu.price AS order__order_menu__menu__price, menu.image_url AS order__order_menu__menu__image_url,
`table`.id AS table__id, `table`.shop_id AS table__shop_id, `table`.capacity AS table__capacity,
shop.name AS shop__name
FROM transaction LEFT JOIN `order` ON `order`.transaction_id = transaction.id LEFT JOIN order_menu ON order_menu.order_id = `order`.id LEFT JOIN menu ON menu.id = order_menu.menu_id LEFT JOIN `table` ON `table`.id = transaction.table_id LEFT JOIN shop ON shop.id = transaction.id WHERE transaction.id = #{id} AND transaction.shop_id = #{shopId}
